quote: A budget doesn’t limit your freedom; it gives you freedom.
author: - Rachel Cruze

quote: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
author: - Dave Ramsey

quote: A budget tells us what we can’t afford, but it doesn’t keep us from buying it.
author: - William Feather

quote: Budgeting only has one rule; Do not go over budget.
author: - Leslie Tayne

quote: The best time to plant a tree is 20 years ago, the second-best time is now.
author: - Chinese proverb
